short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embeds the FunnelBridge widget into the Recruitee platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The FunnelBridge Recruitee Chrome Extension enables seamless integration of WhatsApp into the Recruitee ATS. With this extension, recruiters can send and receive WhatsApp messages directly from the Recruitee web interface. This significantly improves the efficiency and speed of communication with candidates.

For this extension to function properly, your organization must have a FunnelBridge subscription.
